description:
Dot went searching for the Yeti and got lost in a blizzard!  
Help Dot signal for help!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn on red lights.

hints.description: Drag out a Red light. Link the states with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on red lights, make Dot wait for 1.0 s then turn the lights off. Then make Dot wait for 1.0 s and turn on red lights again.

hints.description: Drag out a Lights Off state. Link the light states together with two Wait For cues set to 1.0s.

puzzles.description: Make Dot always wait for 0.2 s before changing the color of the lights.
puzzles.introduction:
If we make the blink rate faster, maybe Dot will be rescued faster.  
Let's try it!

hints.description: Change both of the Wait For cues to wait for 0.2 s.

puzzles.description: Make Dot use the listener to play an FX sound every 2.0 s. After the sound, make Dot instantly turn on red lights.
puzzles.introduction: Let's add a sound to make sure Dot is found!

hints.description: Choose a signal sound. Link the Listener to the sound using a Wait For cue set to 2.0 s. Link the sound to the Red light using an Instant cue.
